### å·¥ä½œå…§å®¹
Love buying and selling on Carousell? Then meet the team that handcrafts various parts of the mobile applications, website and backend systems in order to deliver the best user experience. Here at Carousell, our engineering team works on a myriad of problem domains. You get to work on building the simplest buying and selling experience on our mobile applications, dive deep into our database systems that powers the business, or even work on tools to empower the rest of the teams in Carousell. Every month, we organize an engineering day with different topics, ranging from product hackdays to a Swift workshop by the engineering team members to keep our minds sharp.

Ensuring that the user experience stays simple is complicated - and we take pride in our work to keep things that way.

### èƒ½åŠ›éœ€æ±‚
Requirements

- Build new and key features for the Carousell web platform by working closely with the product and design teams.
- Analyze and optimize performance and reliability of the web app.
- Build a high performance dynamic web application with technologies such as React, Flux, Webpack, ES6, Node.js, etc.
- Take full ownership of projects from design (collaborate with the design team) to implementation and deployment.

### åŠ åˆ†èƒ½åŠ›
Good to have

- Commanding grasp of HTML, CSS and JavaScript
- Experience with modern JavaScript libraries and tooling
- Familiarity with all aspects of MVC web applications (especially those built on Django/Flask)
- Proven ability to ship beautiful, stable and high-performance desktop and mobile web applications from start to finish
- Experience with automated testing framework
- Strong Computer Science background

title: [å¾µæ‰] åŠ æ‹¿å¤§æ–°å‰µ Sinitic.ai èª å¾µå‰ç«¯å·¥ç¨‹å¸« 80k (å¯é è·)
body:
## åœ˜éšŠç°¡ä»‹/åœ°é»

Sinitic is a Canadian startup that helps businesses automate multilingual customer support with our conversational AI technology.

We're recruiting a Front-End Developer with an eye for good UX to work on a key component of the Sinitic Plaform: our Visual Bot Designer.

Our frontend is a Vue2 SPA which communicates with the backend through REST services and Websocket. One of our key advantages is that non-technical users can easily configure their bots by assembling a few blocks using our Visual Bot Designer.

You can either work remotely, or in our Taipei office at Garage+ (å°ç£å°åŒ—å¸‚ä¸­å±±å€ä¸­å±±åŒ—è·¯äºŒæ®µ96è™Ÿ)

## å·¥ä½œå…§å®¹

You will be responsible for maintaining the Visual Bot Designer, our Webchat component, as well as the rest of the Sinitic Platform, troubleshooting performance problems, maintaining good compatibility across evergreen browsers and improving the UX.

## èƒ½åŠ›éœ€æ±‚

Ideally, you can offer these skill sets:

   -  Able to organise its own schedule based on management's priorities.
   -  3+ years experience as a javascript developer.
   -  2+ years experience in role with a big UX/Design component.
   -  Sound knowledge of Webpack and Vue2.
   - Able to troubleshoot performance problems and memory leaks using Chrome/Firefox's developer tools.
   - Effective communication with all levels of our company.
   - Excellent verbal and written communication in at least 2 languages.

### åŠ åˆ†

   - Excellent knowledge of SVG. Experience in D3 is a plus.
   - Excellent knowledge of ES6 or more recent, knowledge of TypeScript is a plus.

## è–ªè³‡ç¯„åœ

NTD 80,000 - 120,000 / month

## å·¥æ™‚/ç‰¹ä¼‘

- 30 vacation days
- Flex hours

## ç¦åˆ©/æ¨è–¦é …

- Sick and compassionate leave
- Gym membership & team activities
- Multicultural work environment

## è¯çµ¡æ–¹å¼

Please send your CV/resume to sami@sinitic.ai
Or apply online: https://sinitic.recruitee.com/o/frontend-developer/c/new

# æ‰¾å‰ç«¯éšŠå‹

[Codementor](https://www.codementor.io) æ˜¯ä¸€é–“ä½æ–¼å°åŒ—çš„åœ‹éš›æ–°å‰µå…¬å¸ï¼Œç›®å‰ä¹Ÿæ˜¯å…¨çƒæœ€å¤§ç·šä¸Šä¸€å°ä¸€ç¨‹å¼æ•™è‚²å¹³å°ã€‚2016å¹´åº•æ¨å‡ºç¬¬äºŒå€‹ä¸»è¦ç”¢å“[CodementorX](https://hire.codementor.io/)ï¼Œæä¾›å·¥ç¨‹å¸«å’Œä¼æ¥­çš„åª’åˆæœå‹™ã€‚æˆ‘å€‘æ›¾ç²å¾—Techstars, 500 startupsç­‰çŸ¥åå‰µæŠ•æŠ•è³‡ï¼Œç”¢å“æ›¾å¤šæ¬¡ç™»ä¸Š Hacker News èˆ‡ Product Hunté¦–é ï¼Œå®¢æˆ¶åŠä½¿ç”¨è€…ä¸»è¦åœ¨åŒ—ç¾å’Œæ­æ´²åœ°å€ç­‰è‹±èªç³»åœ‹å®¶ã€‚
ç¾åœ¨æ­£åœ¨åŠªåŠ›çš„äº‹ï¼š[Dev Protocol](https://www.devprotocol.io/), [TechCrunch News](https://techcrunch.com/2018/03/14/codementor-launches-dev-protocol-which-uses-blockchain-to-help-developers-build-their-reputations/)

Codementor is the leading on-demand mentorship marketplace for developers. We're making it easy for developers to instantly connect with experts via chat, screen/code sharing and video.

We are based in both Taiwan and Silicon Valley, with customers mostly from the US and Europe. Codementor is backed by TechStars, 500 Startups, and other leading investors; we have also been featured in TechCrunch, Forbes, WSJ, Mashable, and more. Our team is working hard to prove that Taiwan has world-class talent that can excel in the global startup scene!

[Dev Protocol](https://www.devprotocol.io/) is a new project that uses blockchain to give software developers a secure place to build their professional reputations.

## åœ˜éšŠä»‹ç´¹
  We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works. Also you have chance to work with global talents worldwide such as Global Digital team in UK and Web Development team in US.

## å·¥ä½œå…§å®¹
- Develop new user-facing features
- Build reusable code and libraries for future use
- Adopt low-code platform to easily build the code
- Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
- Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
- Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end
- Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders

- Solid experience and passion for building highly interactive and efficient web applications using Javascript, CSS, HTML/XHTML, PHP, AJAX, JSON, and Node.js.
- Ability to work in a fast-paced, multitasking environment
- Fast learner and strong sense of ownership of all the platforms and products
- Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills
- Strong understanding of product quality and performance standards
- Excellent communication, and should be able to communicate with various teams globally
- Experience in demonstrated industry is highly desirable
- Ability to take initiative and be innovative
- Fluency in English is highly desirable
- Agile/Scrum process is preferred

title: [Genie Networks] Full-Stack Developers
body:
# Genie Networks is Hiring

## Company Profile
å¨ç¿ç§‘æŠ€(Genie Networks)ç‚ºä¸€å®¶é›»ä¿¡ç¶²è·¯è¨­å‚™è»Ÿé«”é–‹ç™¼å•†ï¼Œè‡´åŠ›æ–¼é–‹ç™¼é«˜ç«¯ç§‘æŠ€èˆ‡è¡ŒéŠ·è‡ªæœ‰å“ç‰Œç”¢å“ï¼Œæä¾›ç¶²è·¯æµé‡çš„å¤§æ•¸æ“šåˆ†æèƒ½åŠ›ä»¥å„ªåŒ–IPç¶²è·¯æ•ˆç‡ï¼Œä¸¦é€éå³æ™‚çš„ç¶²è·¯æ”»æ“Šåµæ¸¬ä»¥æå‡å¤§å‹ç¶²è·¯çš„å®‰å…¨ã€‚ 

å¨ç¿ç§‘æŠ€æ“æœ‰å…ˆé€²çš„IP Flowæµé‡åˆ†ææŠ€è¡“èˆ‡å¤§æ•¸æ“š(Big Data)åˆ†ææ¶æ§‹ï¼Œèƒ½æä¾›å…¨ç¶²æµé‡è¶¨å‹¢çš„å®è§€è¦–è§’ï¼Œä¹Ÿèƒ½æä¾›æ·±å…¥æŒ–æ˜æµé‡å±¬æ€§çš„å¾®è§€åˆ†æï¼Œè®“å®¢æˆ¶èƒ½æ›´ä½³åœ°è¦ç•«ã€ç®¡ç†åŠç‡Ÿé‹ä»–å€‘çš„å¤§å‹ç¶²è·¯ã€‚å¨ç¿ç§‘æŠ€ç”¢å“çš„ç•°å¸¸æµé‡åµæ¸¬å¼•æ“ï¼Œé€éç¶²è·¯è¡Œç‚ºåˆ†æ(Network Behaviour Analysis, NBA)æŠ€è¡“åŠæ©Ÿæ¢°å­¸ç¿’(Machine Learnig)æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œèƒ½å³æ™‚åµæ¸¬DDoSå’Œè •èŸ²æ”»æ“Šç­‰å…·å®‰å…¨å¨è„…çš„ç•°å¸¸æµé‡ï¼Œä¿è­·å®¢æˆ¶å…¨ç¶²çš„å®‰å…¨ã€‚ 

å¨ç¿ç§‘æŠ€ç¸½éƒ¨å’Œç ”ç™¼ä¸­å¿ƒä½æ–¼å°åŒ—ï¼Œä¸¦æ–¼åŒ—äº¬ã€ä¸Šæµ·ã€æ±äº¬ã€æ–°åŠ å¡åŠå­Ÿè²·ç­‰åœ°è¨­æœ‰éŠ·å”®åŠæŠ€è¡“æœå‹™æ“šé»ã€‚æˆ‘å€‘çš„å®¢æˆ¶åŒ…å«å…¨çƒçŸ¥åçš„é›»ä¿¡å…¬å¸ã€ç¶²è·¯æœå‹™é‹ç‡Ÿå•†ã€æ”¿åºœæ©Ÿé—œã€æ•™è‚²å–®ä½åŠå¤§å‹ä¼æ¥­ç­‰ï¼Œç”¢å“è¡ŒéŠ·éä½ˆå…¨çƒ40å¤šå€‹åœ‹å®¶ã€‚æˆ‘å€‘çš„è§£æ±ºæ–¹æ¡ˆæˆåŠŸå¹«åŠ©å®¢æˆ¶æå‡ç¶²è·¯ç‡Ÿé‹çš„æŠ•è³‡å ±é…¬ç‡ï¼Œæ˜¯äºæ´²é›»ä¿¡é‹ç‡Ÿå•†å¸‚å ´ç¶²è·¯æµé‡åˆ†æèˆ‡å®‰å…¨æª¢æ¸¬çš„é ˜å°å“ç‰Œã€‚ 

Genie Networks å¨ç¿ç§‘æŠ€æ¦®ç²ç¬¬åäºŒå±†ITå¹´åº¦ä¸–ç•Œå¤§ç2017æœ€ä½³é›»ä¿¡ç”¢å“ç, æ˜¯Carrier-grade DDoS Detection,Traffic Analysiså¸‚å ´é ˜å°å“ç‰Œã€‚

## Company Products
GenieNetworks focuses on providing the solutions to enhance the operation & management of corporations' IP network, and to create xSP's new business opportunity by innovative technology for years. The solutions include IP Traffic Analysis System and DDoS Prevention System.

## Benefits
* Bonus Sharing
* æ¯æœˆéƒ¨é–€å“¡å·¥èšé¤
* å…¬å¸åœè»Šä½
* Provide Macbook Pro

## Why
* å°ç£å‰µæ–°ï¼Œè¡ŒéŠ·å…¨çƒï¼Œå¤šå…ƒåœ˜éšŠï¼ŒåŸ¹è‚²æ–°ä¸€ä»£ã€‚

## Jobs
### Full-Stack Developers
#### Responsibilities
Develop modern web apps for GenieATM (Advanced Traffic Mining) product lines 
* Comprehend Internet infrastructure and network traffic engineering 
* Simplify provisioning of traffic analysis services with modern web interface 
* Visualize network traffic behaviors and DDoS attacks in real time web engine 
* Integrate with distributed system architecture in scalable back end design 
* Unit test components following agile process 
* Investigate and incorporate cutting edge solutions for grand product vision

#### Skills
* More than two years in web technologies development 
* Understand and apply modern web frameworks/technologies: 
  * web: html5, css/sass, es2015 
  * front end: one of angular, react, or vue
  * back end: nodejs/express, restful APIs, graphQL 
  * db: SQL/NoSQL, redis, etc. 
  * programming: typescript, oo/functional/reactive, git, unit testing 
* Enjoy challenging and learning to deliver better results

#### Locations
* å°åŒ—å¸‚å…§æ¹–ç§‘æŠ€åœ’å€
* å°ä¸­å¸‚åŒ—å±¯å€

#### Contacts

  * https://www.104.com.tw/job/?jobno=60ukr
* å°‡å±¥æ­·å¯„è‡³ hr@genie-networks.com

title: [å¾µæ‰] Frontend Engineer @Bitmark Inc.  (Blockchain Industry)
body:
**Frontend Engineer**

Reports to: Head of Product
Date: Jan 2018
Location: Taipei, Taiwan

[Bitmark Inc.](https://www.bitmark.com/) â€“ a venture-backed software company â€“ is looking for candidates to join our team and accelerate development of our blockchain and related services. You'll get to work in an environment that deeply values design and engineering, alongside a talented team with industry-proven open source (we are ex-Openmoko people) and design experience.

About the company: Bitmark Inc. is a blockchain startup defining property for the digital environment by enabling issuance of property titles for digital assets. As the facilitating network for ownership and stewardship of personal digital ecologies, Bitmark embraces creators and digital environmentalists vying for a healthy internet and Internet of Things.

Profiles that are important to us:

* Strong English communication skills
* You have several years experience with HTML/CSS/JS
* You enjoy collaborating with backend engineers and designers
* Proficiency with Angular is a plus
* Knowledge of cryptocurrencies is a plus
* You are creative and analytical, and like to be appreciated for both
* You are passionate about contributing to open-source codebases

Benefits:

* Competitive salary (yearly package NT$800K up)
* 14 days annual leave from 1st year
* Flexible working hours
* Child care benefits
* Stock options

How to Apply:

Email your portfolio / CV to careers@bitmark.com.

title: EMQ (Fintech)_Web Developer
body:
EMQ is a trusted and safe alternative for international money transfers. EMQ enables lower costs over traditional remittances. EMQ is committed to our customers security, providing convenient, competitively priced services and transparency at every step, for every transfer.
EMQ is based in Hong Kong, with branch offices in Taiwan and China.

Web developer

As a frontend web developer at EMQ you will work on both customer-facing portals and internal tools for our flexible remittance services. You'll work with teams across the company from backend, core product and app development to compliance and operations, and be involved from design to rollout. This position has a high level of responsibility and autonomy.

You should have at least five years of professional software development experience. You should also be;

- Familiar with a range of web languages, frameworks, and tools
- Comfortable with requirements analysis and business process design
- Willing to undertake a paid trial project.
- Fluent in English and Mandarin.

If you are interesting in this position, please contact  rachel@emq.com.

EMQ.Inc

title: Doist - Front-end Engineer
body:
## åœ˜éšŠç°¡ä»‹/åœ°é»
Doist is a global, remote-first company and we believe that our way of workingâ€“ independent of borders and time zonesâ€“ is the future.

Our Products
- [Todoist](https://todoist.com)
- [Twist](https://twistapp.com)

At Doist, we strive to build not only amazing products but amazing groups of people. Our multidisciplinary teams are passionate about creating products like Todoist and Twist that improve peopleâ€™s lives. 


## å·¥ä½œå…§å®¹
Youâ€™ll help improve Todoist by building useful and innovative features, building reusable libraries and tools, and improving our codebases with modern JavaScript tools such React and Redux. 

## èƒ½åŠ›éœ€æ±‚
The ideal candidate is a savvy JavaScript developer with a deep understanding of the latest Internet technologies, a keen engineering intuition, and outstanding communication skills. In addition, you should have:
- Experience building complex interactive web applications.
- Good computer science fundamentals, especially regarding your knowledge related to the web technology stack.
- Solid knowledge of modern JavaScript. You should have a substantial grasp of concepts like prototypes, closures, asynchronous programming and ES6.
- The ability to use and customize tools (i.e. Webpack, Gulp) to streamline your development/build process.
- Proven ability to work autonomously and stay self-motivated, or previous experience working in remote teams.
- Good level of written and spoken English.

### åŠ åˆ†
-  Experience working with React and Redux.

## è–ªè³‡ç¯„åœ
1M+

## å·¥æ™‚/ç‰¹ä¼‘
- 40 hours per week, flexible schedule (remote work)
- 25 days paid vacation
- National holidays


## ç¦åˆ©/æ¨è–¦é …
- Flexible schedule and location
- Education stipends
- Hardwares/home office perks

...and many more :)

## è¯çµ¡æ–¹å¼
steven@doist.com

title: [å¤–å•†å¾µæ‰] Senior Backend Developer
body:
## åœ˜éšŠç°¡ä»‹/åœ°é»
Toronto, Canada

Fast growing Toronto-based WGAMES is looking for talented and passionate Senior Backend Developers, with a strong software development foundation, to join our new studio in Toronto.

## å·¥ä½œå…§å®¹

- Design and implement highly-loaded social gaming engine
- Come up with innovative solutions for large-scale performance and quality measurement efforts 
- Work with technical teams, and senior management to collect requirements, describe software product features, technical designs, and product strategy

## èƒ½åŠ›éœ€æ±‚

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or similar
- 6 years of production back-end development (Ruby on Rails, NodeJS, ASP MVC, Django or similar)
- Strong development experience with developing RESTful JSON HTTP/Websocket API.
- Ready to learn and work with new languages (we are working with nodejs and elixir/erlang)
- Experience with NoSQL (MongoDB, Cassandra or similar)
- Solid foundation in data structures, algorithms, OO Design and patterns. 
- Experience designing, building, and operating distributed complex software systems that have been successfully delivered to customers. 
- Strong communication and collaborative skills in providing technical direction and hands-on software development to include design, development and testing. 

### åŠ åˆ†

- Unit and integration testing experience
- Experience working with data analysis, data manipulation, big data storage. 
- Experience in AWS setup and maintenance
- Experience CI setup and maintenance
- Experience in Erlang/Elixir

## è–ªè³‡ç¯„åœ

- 80k - 120k+/ annually, the annual package is open for discussion

## å·¥æ™‚/ç‰¹ä¼‘

- 40 hr/ week
- Annual leave: 10 days at first year

## ç¦åˆ©/æ¨è–¦é …

- You get to move to Toronto for a career (visa sponsorship). 
- Company kitchen (free cookies, free ice cream, free food, ... etc)

![](https://i.stack.imgur.com/FASL3.jpg)

## è¯çµ¡æ–¹å¼

Please send your CV to:
jobs@wgames.com

title: ã€å¾µæ‰ã€‘[Deep Sentinel] è³‡æ·±å‰ç«¯å·¥ç¨‹å¸« React.js
body:
## åœ˜éšŠç°¡ä»‹/åœ°é»

åšçš„æ˜¯ AI + ç›£æ§ç³»çµ± + Computer Visionï¼Œæœ‰èˆˆè¶£å¯ä»¥çœ‹çœ‹é€™å€‹é€£çµï¼š[äºé¦¬éœã€eBayå‰µè¾¦äººéƒ½æŒºä»–ï¼Œå°ç¾æ··è¡€AIæ–°å‰µå®Œæˆ740è¬ç¾å…ƒAè¼ªèè³‡ï¼Œé€²è»å±…å®¶ä¿å…¨å¸‚å ´](https://www.bnext.com.tw/article/44298/ai-startup-deep-sentinel-raises-seven-point-four-million-us-dollars-focus-on-home-security) ã€‚

æœˆè–ªç›®å‰æ˜¯è¦åŠƒå¤§æ¦‚ 12 è¬åˆ° 20 è¬ï¼ˆå¹´è–ª 12 å€‹æœˆï¼‰çš„å€é–“ï¼Œå·¥ä½œåœ°é»åœ¨å°åŒ—ï¼Œæœ‰æ©Ÿæœƒä¾†ç£å€å‡ºå·®ã€‚

## å·¥ä½œå…§å®¹

We are seeking awesome experienced (preferably 5+ years) Web/Frontend Engineers to join our small team in building a truly next-generation home security system utilizing all the killer bells and whistles: deep learning, hybrid-cloud, big data, etc. We are a tight-knit, fast-paced, high energy start-up team. Our ideal candidate has a passion for code, a love for a fail-fast (and work freaking hard) engineering environment, and a hunger to learn and grow. We prefer raw-intelligence over syntax-excellence, ownership over silos. And coffee over water.

Because we are a small team, this role will span all areas of our frontend tech stack: html, css, javascript, react ,Vue.js, react-native, python flask framework jinja templating. Key elements of our backend stack are Python 3.x on Ubuntu 14.x. Our favorite development tools are github (of course), and docker. We use Jenkins for CI, MySQL and SQLite for our (pretty minimal) RDBMS needs. We arenâ€™t afraid to peel back the covers and work on our open-source components to patch them and we contribute back to the community whenever we can.

## è²¬ä»»ç¯„åœ

### Core development
Developing web codes, templates, and business logic to support a kick-ass UX and the testing necessary to ensure that it JustWorks (â„¢) for the consumer

### Product ownership:
Build new data features from end-to-end: ideation, UX design, development, testing, iteration.
Work as a team:

Collaborating with backend, mobile developers, hardware engineers, data scientists, and CUSTOMERS (yes, you got it right) to polish the existing awesomeness and build new features to build new features

###  Code quality:
Helping us measure, maintaining and improve our code quality

### Metrics Tracking:
Learn how to make user happier and happier by tracking the important metrics of how users use the web product and conducting usability studies programmatically.

### React Native Reviewing and Maintaining
Our mobile app is crafted in react-native. The frontend engineer is expected to learn, review and maintain the mobile app code with our mobile engineers.

## èƒ½åŠ›éœ€æ±‚

1. Deep understanding of Computer Science fundamentals (OOP, data structures, algorithms)
2. 1-2 years minimum experience developing react web applications.
3. Experience with python or php to integrate front-end to the back-end.
4. Familiar with javascript, jquery
5. The Start-Up mentality: The right candidate considers herself/himself to be a â€œget-er-doneâ€ type of person and is looking to have a huge impact at a small company. Hard work is a must, so the right person exudes positive life-giving energy from solving hard technical problems, working hands-on in the code and doing things other people consider impossible. Weâ€™re going to keep the team super small for the time being (lean startup mode FTW) so youâ€™ve gotta be willing to roll up your sleeves and do everything from dev to devops to architecture to QA to IT/OPS. (PS Good newsâ€“the whole team will be like this too, and thatâ€™s the best type of team to be on.)

## è–ªè³‡ç¯„åœ

## é¢è©¦æµç¨‹

## æ‡‰å¾µæ–¹å¼

è«‹å°‡æ‚¨çš„å±¥æ­·ï¼ˆä¸­è‹±æ–‡çš†å¯ï¼‰å¯„è‡³ hr@pointimize.com

---

## About Us

Pointimize is a travel search engine that maximizes users' points and miles value. It allows users to search, compare and book hotel rooms and flight ticket by both cash and award options.

## Pointimize Stack

- Languages: We're currently using **Javascript** as our main language for both front-end and back-end and the migration to **Typescript** is under processing.
- Frameworks: We use **Next.js** as our framework to do server-side rendering which is based on 
 **react**/**redux** and **redux-saga**.
- Databases: **DynamoDB** and **MySQL** for now.
- Cloud Platform: **AWS** as primary and **GCP** for some.
- Other technologies: **ElasticSearch** and **Redis**.

All above are the tech stack we choose since early stage, any discussion are welcomed if you have any other preferred or recommendation for the purpose of extensibility and the potential.

## Responsibilities

- Implement the features and user interfaces of Pointimize web and mobile web products.
- Architect efficient and reusable front-end systems that drive complex web applications.
- Identify and resolve performance and scalability issues.
- Work closely with the Management Team, Product Designers, and Software Engineers to deliver compelling user-facing products.

## Requirements

[Minimum Qualification]

- Possess flexibility, variety, and ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment.
- 1+ years of JavaScript experience, including concepts like asynchronous programming.
- 1+ years of HTML/CSS experience, including concepts like layout, cross-browser compatibility, and accessibility.
- Experience of any front-end framework.
- Love to travel.

[Preferred Qualification]

- Familiar with ES6/ES7.
- Experience with React/Redux.
- Experience in mobile development.
- Experience in full stack development.
- Experience with server-side rendering.
- Experience with webpack or gulp/grunt packages.
- BS/MS in Computer Science or a related technical field.
- Experience in browser APIs and optimizing front-end performance.
- Have the concept of award traveling or is already a player.
- Love traveling.

## Salaries

NTD $80M ~ $120M / year

## Location

Pointimize Taipei Office near Zhongxiao Xinsheng Station

## Interview procedure

Phone interview -> Engineers -> HR -> CEO

## How to apply

Please send your resume to hr@pointimize.com

# Taiwan Biodiversity Information Facility(TaiBIF) is recruiting an experienced front-end web developer.

TaiBIF is the national node of Global Biodiversity Information Facility(GBIF) and follows GBIF Work Programme to build the informatics infrastructure for research data management, thus facilitate open access to biodiversity data in Taiwan. Biodiversity Informatics is an emerging field for informatics innovations therefore an ideal area for engineers whoâ€™d like to contribute to natural resource management and conservation.

http://taibif.tw is the current portal for domestic visitors. We plan to revise the architecture and UI/UX design in order to continue to serve and to support local community.

## You will be responsible for:
1.	Working with content manager and external UI/UX expert, implement the designand address technical challenges that designer faces;
2.	Based on GBIF API (https://www.gbif.org/developer/summary) design and implement species information search, exploration and data download.
3.	Based on selected Content API (WordPress or alike) design and implement the CMS section of the new system.
4.	Implement citation indexing and search.
5.	Internationalize user interface. The primary language for the website is Traditional Chinese, and should be available in English, too.
6.	Coordinating the development with external developers if any component is out-sourced.
7.	Other web development related to the revision of TaiBIF website.

## Qualifications:
1.	Bachelor or master degree in Computer Science or related fields.
2.	Familiar with architectural patterns (MVC or alike). Familiar with NodeJS ecosystems, as well as common JavaScript coding patterns.
3.	Familiar with HTML5, CSS3 JavaScript front-end frameworks (e.g. AngularJS, ReactJS, VueJS, etc.). Familiar with working against RESTful APIs. Having experiences in implementing a production website is a plus.
4.	Paying attention to code quality, coding convention and writing readable code. Taking Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery as standard DevOps practices.
5.	Familiar with Git.
6.	Can work and delivery independently and collaborate with other roles in the team.
7.	Passionate about new technologies and like studying new ways of problem solving. Willing to share findings with peers.
8.	Fluent English in verbal and writing. Can work remotely with external developers.

## Salary
Probation period (3 months) NTD$ 44,781-45,533; Afterwards NTD$ 51,346+. Negotiable. We will try to meet your expectation and be competitive comparing to the industry.

## Location
Interdisciplinary Building at Academia Sinica, Nangang, Taipei, Taiwan.

## Working hours
40 hours/week.

## Equipment
We offer a new MacBook Pro 15â€ for development activities.

## Contact
Please contact Mr. Chihjen Ko (cjk@sinica.edu.tw) with your github handle and LinkedIn profile. Please prefix the subject with â€œ[web developer application]â€ to pass spam filtering.
Questions are welcomed to the above contact, too.

Academia Sinica is the top research institution in Taiwan and offers an immersive environment for developing solutions for academic activities. We are committed to diversity and inclusion, and encourage qualified candidates regardless of nationality, religion, ethnic backgrounds and gender orientation to apply and join us.

The selection process will start after Oct. 31st. If youâ€™re selected for interview, by the 11th of November you will be contacted for further details.

## èƒ½åŠ›éœ€æ±‚
Job responsibility:
- Develop and operate scalable, reliable and maintainable service-based softwares and related components. 
- Cowork with team members to design system architecture, choose proper technologies and plan development. 
- Responsible for laying the foundation for the platform as well as proposing solutions to ease software development, monitoring of software, etc. 
- Profiling and performance tuning of critical components 
- Deploy system to production and monitor service health.

Requirements:
- Ability to build web services on Linux. 
- Good at any of the listed language: Python / C / C++ / Scala / Go. 
- Good knowledge of Network API Design ( e.g. REST or GraphQL).
- Good understanding of any SQLSQL database (MySQL / MongoDB / Redis / etc.) 
- Familiar with git. 
- Team player and able to work independently. 
- 4+ years of experience in Internet Industry. 
- Good at profiler and debugging tools. 
- High performance network service on Linux. 
- Design and architect large scale distributed system. 
- Design and implement distributed algorithm and data structure. 
- Familiar with HTML and Javascript. 
- Familiar with Nginx / HAProxy. 
- Familiar with operation automation tool (such as Ansible). 
- Familiar with continuous integration / continuous deployment 
- Familiar with monitoring and alert system (Prometheus / Nagios). 
- Familiar with Amazon Web Service or Google Compute Engine.
- Deep understanding of the technological landscape, ranging from DNS, HTTP, CDN

title: Job Opening - Director Information Technology, Winston Benefits - Manasquan, New Jersey
body:
JOB DESCRIPTION: Director - Information Technology **local candidates only with authorization to work in the US**

The Director of Information Technology provides the vision and leadership for designing, developing and implementing IT initiatives that create value. Responsibilities include influencing and directing the Companyâ€™s IT infrastructure and applications evolution to ensure key business strategies and processes are driven by systems that enable change, growth and flexibility. The Director must ensure our IT infrastructure is reliable, secure, cost efficient, and strategically sound, reflecting business needs and best practice in creating value for the company and our customers. 

Lead, develop and implement IT initiatives that enable the Company to compete more vigorously and more profitably in a constantly changing and demanding marketplace. 
Translates the company vision into IT systems and procedures
Manage, motivate, and develop all staff within the IT group. 
Ensure the organizational structure is appropriate for supporting current and future business needs. Recruit appropriate talent. 
Drive cross-functional collaboration through the IT team 
Ensure our systems environment addresses the needs of the business. 
Translate business needs into system solutions making maximum use of available tools while ensuring longer term supportability of the architecture. 
Ensure availability of necessary application systems to support business and operation needs. 
Develop IT policies and procedures on a basis for ensuring consistency in standards and leveraging of common systems. 
Lead and coordinate selection, installation, operation, support, and maintenance of our information technology infrastructure (i.e. operating systems, networks, telecommunications, hardware, and peripherals). 
Protect the company and its operations against IT risks, including unauthorized access to information, data integrity problems, loss of processing capability, and poor service levels. 
Cooperate with operating units in conceptualizing, developing, and launching technology based products and services. 

EDUCATION, EXPERIENCE, SKILLS 
Bachelors degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or closely related field
7+ years of IT Management experience 
15+ years of total IT experience including computer operations management, multiple roles in systems implementation, supervision of technical personnel, architecture, security/compliance, business-wide strategic planning and budgetary responsibility. 
 Ability to establish immediate credibility at all levels, inside and outside the organization.

 Technical Skills / Technical Environment: 
â€¢ Experience with multiple software development methodologies including Waterfall and Agile. â€¢ Understanding of and experience with the full Software Development Life Cycle. 
â€¢ Knowledge of source control management and automated testing concepts. 
â€¢ Experience in a SQL / .NET environment a plus. 

 REPORTS TO: Senior VP, Operations
Send resume with salary requirements to careers@winstonbenefits.com

body:
## å…¬å¸ç°¡ä»‹

Migo (www.migo.tv) is a consumer focused innovation company addressing the digital divide in emerging markets, with over 200 Imagineers in Taipei and Manila. Headquartered in Taipei with primary operations in the Philippines, Migo is a one-of-a-kind service that harnesses technical innovation to deliver accessible and affordable entertainment and education to billions of consumers who live on $5-$10 a day, in markets such as the Philippines, Indonesia and Africa. Migo's technology, a combination of hardware and software developed in-house, is designed specifically for the unique infrastructure and economic challenges that exist in our markets. We have designed, built, and tested which is uniquely capable of serving the most price- sensitive consumer by cutting the costs of delivering data by 100 times.

Migo is led by Barrett Comiskey, inducted into the U.S. National Inventors Hall of Fame as one of the fathers of E Ink (the technology behind the Amazon Kindle), which he developed as an undergraduate at MIT. He holds an M.B.A. from Stanford University. Barrett is a proven entrepreneur with a track record of success. He has been living in Asia for the last 15 years, and Migo is the culmination of decades of thought and experience.

We are a young, ambitious, and innovative company pursuing a transformative mission. We are currently expanding operations in the Philippines and preparing to scale in the region.

å°çŸ¥è­˜ï¼šä»€éº¼æ˜¯ç¤¾æœƒä¼æ¥­ï¼Ÿã€Œç¤¾æœƒä¼æ¥­ã€æŒ‡çš„æ˜¯ä¸€å€‹ç”¨å•†æ¥­æ¨¡å¼ä¾†è§£æ±ºæŸä¸€å€‹ç¤¾æœƒæˆ–ç’°å¢ƒå•é¡Œçš„çµ„ç¹”ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚æä¾›å…·ç¤¾æœƒè²¬ä»»æˆ–ä¿ƒé€²ç’°å¢ƒä¿è­·çš„ç”¢å“/æœå‹™ï¼Œç‚ºé‚Šç·£æ—ç¾¤å‰µé€ å°±æ¥­æ©Ÿæœƒç­‰ã€‚å…¶çµ„ç¹”å¯ä»¥ä»¥ç‡Ÿåˆ©å…¬å¸æˆ–éç‡Ÿåˆ©çµ„ç¹”ä¹‹å‹æ…‹å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œä¸¦ä¸”æœ‰ç‡Ÿæ”¶èˆ‡ç›ˆé¤˜ã€‚å…¶ç›ˆé¤˜ä¸»è¦ç”¨ä¾†æŠ•è³‡ç¤¾æœƒä¼æ¥­æœ¬èº«ï¼Œç¹¼çºŒè§£æ±ºè©²ç¤¾æœƒæˆ–ç’°å¢ƒå•é¡Œï¼Œè€Œéç‚ºå‡ºè³‡äººæˆ–æ‰€æœ‰è€…è¬€å–æœ€å¤§çš„åˆ©ç›Šã€‚
## åœ˜éšŠç°¡ä»‹/åœ°é»

Location: Taipei, Taiwan (business trips to Manila, Philippines required) 

Migo is a global team of Imagineers â€“ and the team is growing. 

As Imagineers, we are deeply committed to and bound together by our mission: bringing entertainment and education to everyone through innovation. In this endeavor, we pursue the constant improvement of ourselves, our teammates, our organization, and the lives of the people we serve. We are seeking new Imagineers who yearn for the opportunity to work with a purpose, devoting their days to creating & delivering solutions to the world's most pressing problems. We value potential over experience, character over rÃ©sumÃ©, and curiosity over knowledge. 

In a typical week at Migo, an Imagineer stretches and builds many different muscles: working closely with other Imagineers across the company through cross-functional teams, developing new abilities, and having targeted discussions with peers and leaders to deliver ever greater results. Every week, Imagineers strive to produce world-class output while learning, following their strongest passions, and discovering new ones. Migo is where they pursue their life's work. 

Imagineering at Migo is the opportunity to pursue meaningful work, to be at the top of your game, and to build a company which will transform the lives of the next generation of emerging market consumers.

Migoèªç‚ºæ‡‰è©²è³¦äºˆäººæ‰ç­‰åŒçš„æ©Ÿæœƒç™¼æ˜è‡ªæˆ‘å’Œå…¶å¯èƒ½æ€§ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯è¢«éå»çš„å­¸æ­·å’ŒèƒŒæ™¯é™åˆ¶ã€‚åœ¨Migoï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰æˆå“¡å…±ç”¨ Imagineeré€™å€‹è·ç¨±ï¼Œç‚ºäº†æ‰“ç ´å‚³çµ±çµ„ç¹”æ¶æ§‹åŠè·å‹™åˆ†é…æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œæ¯ä½Imagineeréƒ½éœ€è¦ç¸±è§€å…¨å±€ï¼Œæ¸…æ¥šäº†è§£ä»–å€‘åœ¨å…¬å¸ä¸åŒéšæ®µæ‰€æ‰®æ¼”çš„è§’è‰²ï¼Œé«”èªå¤§å®¶æ˜¯ä¸€å€‹åœ˜éšŠï¼Œå…±åŒæœè‘—ä¸€è‡´çš„ç›®æ¨™å‰é€²ã€‚ Imagineerçš„æ¯ä¸€é …å·¥ä½œå…§å®¹èˆ‡æ—¥å¸¸æ±ºå®šéƒ½èƒ½ç›´æ¥å½±éŸ¿å…¬å¸é•·æœŸçš„ç™¼å±•ã€‚

Imagineerçš„å·¥ä½œå…§å®¹ä»¥å•é¡Œä½œç‚ºå°å‘ï¼Œå…¬å¸é¼“å‹µæ€è€ƒ â€œhow could we?â€ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨è·³è„«æ¡†æ¶çš„æ€ç¶­æ¨¡å¼å¤§è†½å‡è¨­ï¼Œå‹‡æ–¼å˜—è©¦ ï¼Œé€éå¯¦ä½œçš„éç¨‹ä¸­å­¸ç¿’ã€‚Migoå¡‘é€ äº†ä¸€å€‹é¼“å‹µä¸æ–·å­¸ç¿’çš„ç’°å¢ƒï¼Œä¹Ÿæä¾›ä¸€å€‹ç„¡é‚Šéš›çš„ç©ºé–“è®“Imagineerç™¼æ®èˆ‡æˆé•·ï¼Œè€Œæˆé•·ä¸¦ä¸æœƒè¢«è·å‹™åˆ†é…åŠå·¥ä½œè³‡æ­·æ‰€é™åˆ¶ã€‚æˆé•·çš„æ©Ÿæœƒæ˜¯ä»¥æ¯å€‹äººçš„æˆé•·æ›²ç·šæ‰€æ±ºå®šï¼Œç•¶Imagineerç„¡æ³•å¾å·¥ä½œä¸­ç¹¼çºŒå­¸ç¿’ï¼Œå°å¸«æœƒå”åŠ©æ‰¾å°‹æ›´æœ‰æŒ‘æˆ°æ€§çš„å·¥ä½œï¼Œå…¶æ–¹æ³•æœ‰æ“´å¤§å·¥ä½œç¯„åœæˆ–å°‡ä¸€å€‹ä¸ç†Ÿæ‚‰é ˜åŸŸçš„å•é¡Œäº¤çµ¦Imagineerè§£æ±ºã€‚

## å·¥ä½œå…§å®¹

The Software Engineering function is part of the greater Product team comprised of Imagineers from a diverse range of backgrounds in engineering, science, and design. We all share a profound understanding of customer needs and the ability to synthesize those needs with business objectives and technology solutions. Innovation doesn't happen on its own, and we're at the forefront of it doing real research and development to solve problems that don't have answers. We apply interdisciplinary engineering knowledge and user-centered design principles within local market contexts to design and build holistic experience ecosystems that bridge the technology and infrastructure gaps present in Migo's markets. We participate in the full product development process from conception of new product ideas through analysis of business viability through development into real products, all while maintaining close collaboration with teams across the organization and our customers.

â€¢	Architect, design and implement highly available and scalable consumer facing and enterprise solutions on a highly decentralized service platform. 
â€¢	Full stack service and application level architecture design, development and implementation: from front end user experience to building a robust platform service 
â€¢	Daily involvement in agile software development life cycle with close collaboration with cross-functional teams 
â€¢	Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement best practices and tools to maximize development efficiency

## èƒ½åŠ›éœ€æ±‚
â€¢	Strong analytical skills required to perform high frequency decision making during development cycle 
â€¢	Comfortable with ambiguity to form living specs and learning through rapid experimentation and readings
â€¢	Is customer-centric and passionate about building high quality, scalable software
â€¢	Strong growth mindset and a desire to evolve into a well-rounded interdisciplinary thinker 
â€¢	1-5 years of experience in software development 

### åŠ åˆ†

Exposure and expertise in one of the following domain knowledge is a plus (not must have):
â€¢	Data manipulation and processing with relational database or NoSQL
â€¢	Android/iOS mobile app development
â€¢	Server side backend frameworks such as Node.js, Ruby on Rails, Java Spring, Python Django, etc.
â€¢	Modern frontend framework such as Bootstrap, AngularJS, ReactJS, etc
  
## è–ªè³‡ç¯„åœ

580K-1.3M/year (fixed 13 month salary)

## å·¥æ™‚/ç‰¹ä¼‘

Responsibility/Trust based. Unlimited leaves. 

## ç¦åˆ©/æ¨è–¦é …

â€¢ Health/Labor Insurance 
â€¢ Company Issued Laptop & Mobile Phone 
â€¢ Flexible Vacation Leaves 
â€¢ Free Snacks and Drinks (Free beer every Friday!) 
â€¢ Company parties to celebrate special events or holidays (Halloween, Christmas, End of Year etc.)

ã€Our Number One Benefitã€‘ 
The number one benefit at Migo is the responsibility, trust and limitless opportunity for growth we give each Imagineer. Leaders focus on insight and results, not process or policies.

Imagineers at Migo are working on a first-in-the-world service and technology, a vision, that is big enough to change the lives of billions of underserved people in the world. Migo is committed to helping Imagineers reach their unlimited potential. Curiosity and Learning is at the core of our values.

We have a structured Imagineer training which will teach Imagineers the Migo way of thinking and doing. We only hire people that are intrinsically motivated to learn and grow. We are committed to providing the resources our Imagineers need to be the best, not just in Taiwan, but globally.

##æ‡‰å¾µ/ è¯çµ¡æ–¹å¼

Apply through our company website www.migo.tv/join by clicking the "Join Us" button at the top right corner.  

If you have any questions please email cecilia@migo.tv

body:
## åœ˜éšŠç°¡ä»‹/åœ°é»

å°ç£æ˜¯LINEåœ¨ç¸½éƒ¨ä»¥å¤–ç¬¬ä¸€å€‹è¨­ç«‹å·¥ç¨‹åœ˜éšŠçš„æ“šé»ï¼åœ¨å°ç£çš„å·¥ç¨‹åœ˜éšŠå¯åˆ†ç‚ºäº”å¤§é¡: Application Development (Server-sideã€Android/iOSã€Front-endåŠQA)ã€Technical Consultantã€ITã€Securityå’ŒGame Engineerã€‚èº«ç‚ºLINEå°ç£çš„å·¥ç¨‹åœ˜éšŠçš†å¯åŒæ™‚åƒèˆ‡åœ¨åœ°åŒ–å’Œç¸½éƒ¨å°ˆæ¡ˆï¼Œä¾‹LINE TODAYï¼Œå°±æ˜¯å¾è¦åŠƒã€è¨­è¨ˆã€åŸ·è¡Œåˆ°ç¶­è­·éƒ½æ˜¯å°ç£åœ˜éšŠè² è²¬ï¼›è€Œå»å¹´åæœˆæ¨å‡ºçš„LINE Momentså‰‡æ˜¯LINEæ—¥æœ¬ç¸½éƒ¨çš„æ¡ˆå­ï¼Œç”±LINE Taiwanå·¥ç¨‹åœ˜éšŠéƒ¨åˆ†åƒèˆ‡ï¼›ä»¥åŠLINE@Commerceå¾Œå°ç³»çµ±ä¸­çš„è¶…å•†å–è²¨åŠŸèƒ½ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ç”±å°ç£å·¥ç¨‹åœ˜éšŠæ‰€é–‹ç™¼å®Œæˆçš„å‘¢ï¼

ç¦å²¡ä¸åƒ…æ˜¯ä¹å·åœ°å€æœ€å¤§çš„éƒ½å¸‚ï¼Œæ›´æ˜¯è¢«è©•æ¯”ç‚ºä¸–ç•Œæœ€å®œå±…ä½åŸå¸‚ç¬¬ä¸ƒåã€‚å…¶ç¨ç‰¹çš„åœ°ç†ç’°å¢ƒåŠäººæ–‡ç´ é¤Šï¼Œä¹Ÿè®“LINEæ–¼2013å¹´é¸æ“‡ç¦å²¡åšå¤šå€æˆç«‹è¾¦å…¬å®¤ï¼Œæ˜¯æ—¥æœ¬è¨­ç«‹çš„ç¬¬äºŒå€‹æ“šé»ã€‚ç›®å‰å·¥ç¨‹åœ˜éšŠç´„60äººï¼Œä¸€åŠç‚ºå¤–ç±å“¡å·¥ï¼Œä¾†è‡ªæ­ã€ç¾ã€ä¸­ã€éŸ“ã€å°ç­‰åœ‹å®¶ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­æœ‰ä¸ƒåå°ç£äººï¼Œæœ‰äº”åæ˜¯ç”±Adecco Taiwanèˆ‰èéå»ã€‚LINE Fukuokaç”±æ–¼å·¥ç¨‹åœ˜éšŠé¾å¤§ï¼Œå› æ­¤å…¬å¸ä¸åƒ…æ³¨é‡åŸºç¤å¹³å°çš„å»ºç«‹ï¼Œæ›´ä¸»å‹•æŠ•å…¥è³‡æºèˆ‡æ™‚é–“é¼“å‹µå“¡å·¥å­¸ç¿’ã€æ‡‰ç”¨æ–°æŠ€è¡“ï¼Œç”šè‡³ä¸å®šæœŸèˆ‰è¾¦è®€æ›¸æœƒè®“å·¥ç¨‹å¸«æŒçºŒæå‡æŠ€è¡“èƒ½åŠ›ï¼

æ›´å¤šè³‡è¨Šè«‹åƒè€ƒç¶²ç«™ï¼šhttps://goo.gl/xCV2kK

## å·¥ä½œå…§å®¹

- Participate product/application development life cycle, including planning, analysis, design, implementation and maintenance, focus on UX/UI design both for PC and mobile.
- Implementing a front end for web applications with HTML/CSS/JavaScript according to demands from designers and planners
- Creating mockups and prototypes, verifying the output 
- Proposing and designing UI with consideration of UX 
- Write technical specifications based on conceptual design, business/technical requirements.
- Support short-term project like event or campaign to create campaign page or EDM.
- Researching and developing new web technologies 
- Improving performance and maintaining products with high quality 
- Implementing UI components and libraries
- System design and documentation


## èƒ½åŠ›éœ€æ±‚

- Expertise knowledge of HTML/CSS/JavaScript
- At least 3 years of experience developing PC and smart device web applications
- SPA (Single-page Application) implementation experience
- Knowledge of accessibility / utility
- Knowledge of CSS pre-processors
- Experience with various development tools (e.g. build tools, task runners, etc.)


### åŠ åˆ†

- Experience developing native iOS /Android applications
- Experience developing with server side languages (e.g. Java, Perl, etc.)
- Experience with CI (continuous integration)
- Contributions to or active participation in the OSS community 

## è–ªè³‡ç¯„åœ

å°ç£ï¼šNTD 1~2M+/ annuallyï¼ˆå¾young talentåˆ°è³‡æ·±å·¥ç¨‹å¸«éƒ½æœ‰æ‹›å‹Ÿï¼Œå› æ­¤ç¯„åœå¯«å¾—æ¯”è¼ƒå»£ï¼Œæ ¹æ“šéå»çš„ç¶“é©—å¯ä»¥ä¾æ“šèƒ½åŠ›æä¾›å…·ç«¶çˆ­åŠ›çš„è–ªè³‡ï¼Œè«‹æ‡‰å¾µè€…æ”¾å¿ƒï¼Œä¹Ÿæ­¡è¿å…ˆä¾†ä¿¡è¨è«–å†æ±ºå®šæ˜¯å¦æ‡‰å¾µï¼‰

æ—¥æœ¬ï¼šJPY 6~7M+/ annually + relocation fee 


## å·¥æ™‚/ç‰¹ä¼‘

10:00 am ~ 7:00 pm


## å…¶ä»–ç¦åˆ©

æ—¥æœ¬è·ä½ä¸éœ€æœƒæ—¥æ–‡ï¼ŒLINEæœƒæä¾›3~6å€‹æœˆçš„æ—¥æ–‡èª²ç¨‹ï¼ŒåŠå¤©ä¸Šæ—¥æ–‡ã€åŠå¤©ä¸Šç­

title: ã€ä»£ä¼æ¥­å¾µæ‰ã€‘Frontend Engineer
body:
## Introduction
Established in 2014, we partner with early-stage startups and tackle new ventures, surrounding entrepreneurs with the proper support to develop new and disruptive products.
As a Venture Studio, we develop multiple projects simultaneously. 
We identify the promising ones, and provide technology know-how, development and management skills â€“ and of course funding â€“ to turn those ground-breaking ideas into working businesses.
## Responsibilities
- Solid understanding of Javascript, ES6, JSX 
- React, Redux, Angular, Express, and other related framework 
- In-depth knowledge of HTML5, CSS3 and pre-processors (Less or Sass) 
- Front End Architecture experience of building reuse components as company asset and collect best practice of optimizing design arts, files, etc. 
- Demonstrate good familiarity of editor usage, including plugin, and tool usage, like inspect, 
- Experience using development tools such as Node.js & Gulp & WebPack, Babel 
- TDD using testing framework, like Mocha. 
## Qualifications
- CMS Integration experience 
- E-commerce experience 
- RWD, bootstrap 
- ES6, JSX 
- WebPack, Babel, Gulpâ€¦.
## Salary
annual: 1-1.2M
## Working hours
9am-6pm, 1hr lunch time
## Contact information
Bella Chao
bella.chao@robertwalters.com.tw

title: ã€ä»£å¤–å•†å¾µæ‰ã€‘Senior Front-end Engineer
body:
## Introduction
We are looking for bright, creative, self-starting engineers with broad experience developing and optimizing UX/UI for web application.
## Responsibilities
- Participate product/application development life cycle, including planning, analysis, design, implementation and maintenance, focus on UX/UI design both for PC and mobile.
- Implementing a front end for web applications with HTML/CSS/JavaScript according to demands from designers and planners
- Creating mockups and prototypes, verifying the output 
- Proposing and designing UI with consideration of UX 
- Write technical specifications based on conceptual design, business/technical requirements.
- Support short-term project like event or campaign to create campaign page or EDM.
- Researching and developing new web technologies 
- Improving performance and maintaining products with high quality 
- Implementing UI components and libraries
- System design and documentation
## Qualifications
- Expert knowledge of HTML/CSS/DOM/JavaScript
- Experience designing, developing and abstracting user interface elements and classes.
- Ability to work independently with HTML5, CSS3
- Experience developing PC/Smartphone web applications (3+years) 
- Experience developing SPA (Single-page Applications) 
- Fundamental knowledge of accessibility and usability 
- Knowledge of CSS Preprocessors 
- Experience prototyping tools like in Balsamiq, Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, etc.
##Preferred 
- Experience using tools for build and task runners (CI - continuous integration )
- Experience developing native iOS, Android applications 
- Experience developing applications with server-side languages such as Java, Perl 
- Familiarity with libraries such as Bootstrap, jQuery, Highcharts, etc.
- Contribution to OSS projects and communities
- Preferred knowledge of web performance technology.
- Experience in understanding large and complex code bases.
- Typically requires BSCS degree and 5+ years of directly related experience, or MSCS and 3+ years.
## Salary
annual: 1.1-1.4M
## Working hours
9am-6pm, 1hr lunch time
## Contact information
Bella Chao
bella.chao@robertwalters.com.tw

title: ã€å¾µæ‰ã€‘Remote Senior Front-end Developer in BLOOMON
body:
## åœ˜éšŠç°¡ä»‹

https://www.facebook.com/bloomonUK
http://jobs.bloomon.com/

bloomon turns the traditional flower industry on its head with a unique style, ultra fresh flowers from our growers and personal delivery to our customers. The flower sector is huge with over â‚¬50 billion in annual turnover but 99% of the sector still operates offline. bloomon is driving the shift to online.
 
Our company and team are expanding rapidly. With an international team of over 80 highly motivated and ambitious people we are active in five countries. bloomon has its main office in Amsterdam, but also operates out of Berlin, London and Taiwan.
The bloomon team consists of seasoned e-commerce experts (ex-Rocket Internet) as well as strategy-consultants (The Boston Consulting Group, McKinsey, SparkOptimus), and has raised funding from renowned VCs as well as international entrepreneurs. Our IT team has built an in-house subscription based ecommerce platform with an independent API server that can be coupled with any interface.

Joining us will be challenging and rewarding. A unique opportunity to take a large role in further developing our software in a fast growing, entrepreneurial environment. You will gain the broadest experience and will work together with skilled developers and business experts. We offer an attractive compensation package.

## åœ°é»

- Amsterdam, Netherlands
- Taipei, Taiwan
- Remote

## å·¥ä½œå…§å®¹

- Building user facing features, interface, APIs and core functions.
- Build reusable code and libraries for future use
- Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
- Capable of testing across multiple browsers, platforms
- Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability

## èƒ½åŠ›éœ€æ±‚

- React.js + redux 
  - Or very experienced with a high-level Javascript framework such as React.js, Vue.js, Angular.js, or - Ember.js
- ES6 / Babel with webpack
- Unit testing

### åŠ åˆ†

- Nightwatch.js or Selenium
- React sagas
- Grid layouts based on e.g. react-flexbox-grid or Bootstrap
- Unit or end-to-end testing
- Material UI

85K ~ 100K NTD+

## åœ˜éšŠç°¡ä»‹/åœ°é»
Yahoo is focused on making the worldâ€™s daily habits more inspiring and entertaining. By creating highly personalized experiences for our users, we keep people connected to what matters most to them, across devices and around the globe. 

Are you passionate about Search, Advertising and Web technologies? Do you like to take challenges and solve difficult problems? Do you want to have the satisfaction that millions of users use your product every day? If the answers are yes, this is the place for you. Yahoo provides a stage for people to learn and build state-of-the-art internet products that are the daily habits of people around the world.

Interact with smart and talented engineers from different regions

## èƒ½åŠ›éœ€æ±‚

Good understanding of CS fundamentals (algorithms, data structures, object-oriented programming, design patterns)
Solid programming experience in Javascript, PHP, or similar.
Strong command of browser-side client technologies including AJAX, HTML5, and CSS3
Experience with cross-browser compatibility techniques & browser degradation strategies are advantage
Proactive, good interpersonal and problem-solving skill
Team player and able to work independently

### åŠ åˆ†

title: Full Stack JS contractor, fluent English, $100k/mo
body:
**Project**

We're building a LINE/FB chatbot platform for restaurants. The goals are for customers to give feedback, to come back to the restaurant more often, and to introduce their friends.

This project has 3 main components:

1. Web app for customers (React, Redux)
2. Native app for restaurant staff (React Native, Redux)
3. Services (AWS Lambda, Serverless, MongoDB)

**Team**

Hi, I'm Phil. I'm an ex-Google PM and I co-founded a startup in Beijing which was acquired by YY (Nasdaq: YY).

We will be working closely with our partner restaurant, Revel Eatery (https://www.facebook.com/reveleatery/) as a test case. If successful, we will build chatbots for other partner restaurants and eventually build a platform so any restaurant can create their own chatbot.

**Location**

å¿ å­æ•¦åŒ–

**Requirements**

1. Learn fast
2. Communicate well
3. Think independently

Bonus points for experience with lean software development + git

**Work week**

4 days co-working, 1 day remote

**Compensation**

$100k/month
Daily healthy lunches provided by Freshies (https://www.facebook.com/freshiestw/)

**Contact**

If interested, please send me a code sample: phil@harton.org

Thanks for your time :)

## åœ˜éšŠç°¡ä»‹/åœ°é»
7SENSE is a Big Data start-up looking for passionate full-stack JavaScript developers to build the customer-facing portal for our workflow software. We have a leadership team of founders that provide thought leadership in Big Data and have a proven track record of success. 

Our team is well-versed in deriving insight using Big Data technologies. Our technology has marketplace traction with established industry leaders, and the demand is growing.

Developer should have a solid understanding of [immutability](https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%B8%8D%E5%8F%AF%E8%AE%8A%E7%89%A9%E4%BB%B6) and be comfortable with the [`Redux`](https://github.com/reactjs/redux) data flow.

KKStream æ˜¯KKBOX é›†åœ˜æ——ä¸‹ç›®å‰æä¾›B2Bå½±éŸ³ä¸²æµçš„æœå‹™æŠ€è¡“

Please check to see the official website for KKStream:  http://www.kkstream.com.tw

ã€å·¥ä½œå…§å®¹ã€‘
If you canâ€™t stop digging news and techniques about cloud computing, queuing systems, and/or job distribution, here is the place for you to contribute your energy. Weâ€™re looking for a cloud platform engineer to work closely with other video engineers to build a video streaming service. You will have chance to work as one of core members to create the whole system from the scratch.

* Duties and Responsibilities:
- Designing and implementing microservices to provide video streaming service through (RESTful) APIs.
- Working with front-end-engineers to feed back queued job status.
- Working with third-party vendors/services to integrate as sub-services.
- Building from scratch the infrastructure, of course, based on cloud services.

* Qualifications:
- 2+ years of relevant cloud computing development experience, especially AWS.
- Experience with high-level scripts, like Python, Javascript, or modern languages, like Go.
- Knowledge of cloud computing techniques, especially Docker, serverless techniques, SQL or NoSQL
- Experience with web techniques, including HTML5, CSS(3) and some Javascript frameworks.
- BS/MS/PhD in Computer Science (or equivalent).
- Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.### åŠ åˆ†

title: Linker Networks Inc. - Senior Front-End Engineer
body:
**Senior Front-End Engineer**

Weâ€™re looking for Senior Front-End Engineer who is motivated to combine the art of design and art of programming. Youâ€™ll be responsible for translating UI/UX wireframe or concept to actual codes. Youâ€™ll be responsible for building web-based dashboard for displaying and manipulating analyzed data.

**Skills and Qualifications**
Great Communication Skill.
Familiar with HTML, and Javascript.
Basic understanding of CSS.
Experience with at least one Front-End framework, such as Angular2 or React.js.
Experience with at least one CSS framework, such as Bootstrap.
(Optional) Experience with UI/UX, Wireframe.
(Optional) Experience with Web Analytic tools, such as Google analytics or Mixpanel.
(Optional) Advanced understanding of CSS.

**Location**
Taipei, Taiwan.

**Salary**
800k+ per year package depending on seniority and experience. 
For more details, please send your CV and make an appointment.

**Work type**
Full time with responsibility!

**Perks**
Based on Labor Standard Laws, but 8 paid days for your first year!
Contract+ Stock option.
Embracing open source technologies everyday and implementing real global data projects!

**Application**
1.  CV for no more than 2 pages
2. Interview
To apply for this position, please send your CV to: Chialing@linkernetworks.com

**# Visit our Company @ http://linkernetworks.com**

## åœ˜éšŠç°¡ä»‹/åœ°é»

PChome Thai / Taipei
æ±å—äºå¸‚å ´æ­£å¤¯ï¼Œä½ ä¹Ÿæƒ³æˆç‚ºå…ˆç™¼éƒ¨éšŠçš„ä¸€åˆ†å­å—ï¼Ÿ

ç›¡æƒ…ç™¼æ®å°ç”¢å“çš„å‰µé€ åŠ›ã€‚

PChome Thai is looking for a passionate and talented Software Engineer to join our team in Taiwan. Youâ€™ll be a part of an engineering team that is dedicated to developing a reliable and robust C2C shopping platform for Thailand.

We expect the personality of candidate is proactive, independent, adventure-lover,multi-task oriented, love challenge, could find problem and try to seek the solution!
As you know, PChome Thailand now in this new market, we are more like a start-up, no one will tell you what is right or what is wrong. We think together, we try what we think might be right together, we wait the market response, and then we revise based on the market. 
This is the way how we want the team act!!
## å·¥ä½œå…§å®¹
- Develop and maintain E-commerce site(C2C shopping platform) for Thailand
- Work closely with PM, design team and business marketing team to create best solutions for customers

title: ã€å¾µæ‰ã€‘Rakuten Taiwan - Front-end Application Engineer - ECBS
body:
## åœ˜éšŠç°¡ä»‹/åœ°é»

E-Commerce Business Support Section delivers the software platform which provide valuable applications to our global business staffs, our vision is to bring a fastest and smooth daily business operation.

We investigate the business process and integrate with information technology to build up a state of the art system, this position serves as the front-end engineer to deliver a web application for supporting:
- E-commerce metadata management
- Merchant and Shop Management
- Campaign Management
- Order Management
- Analytic and Reporting

Our service is based on Ruby on Rails, AngularJS, Java, MySQL, Oracle and Hadoop, you will focus on the front-end development, and having the opportunity for job transfer.
In addition, we always strive to improve our services using cutting-edge technology.

After joining our group, you will become part of a development team as a software engineer.
We will arrange for a position that best suits you based on your preferences and skills.
We have multiple locations (Tokyo, Osaka, Sendai, and Taipei) and work as â€œone teamâ€. You will get global experience.

Location: Taipei
## å·¥ä½œå…§å®¹
- Design, develop for, and operate a 24/7/365 system.
- Understand business needs and define the best architecture.
- Plan and execute projects with engineers in your team and other product/project managers.
## èƒ½åŠ›éœ€æ±‚
- Experience in software development (Design, Development, Test, Release, Operation)
- Programming experience in one of following: RoR , Java, PHP, Node.js
- Programming experience in React JS or Angular JS
- Programming experience in HTML, CSS, Javascript
- Experience in Linux
## åŠ åˆ†
- TOEIC 700+
- Development and operation experience of consumer service 
- Experience with large-scale systems
- Experience with offshore development
## èªè¨€èƒ½åŠ›
- English: Business Level

NTD. 40K ~ 80K (Depend on skills)

title: ã€å¾µæ‰ã€‘Rakuten Taiwan - Front-end Application Engineer - Internal business system (Dev)
body:
## åœ˜éšŠç°¡ä»‹/åœ°é»

We are seeking a software engineer to build applications for business staff who manage Taiwan and Japan Rakuten Ichiba.

You will develop a front-end web application for supporting business operations (ex. Order Management, Campaign Management, Call Center, Shop Management).

Our service is based on Ruby on Rails, AngularJS, Java, MySQL, Oracle and Hadoop.
In addition, we always strive to improve our services using cutting-edge technology.
We have a front-end team to develop web-based applications and a back-end team to develop platforms using Hadoop, etc.
You will join a front-end team. There will be many chances to learn from each other.

After joining our group you will become part of a development team as a software engineer.
We will arrange for a position that best suits you based on your preferences and skills.
We have multiple locations (Taipei, Tokyo, Osaka) and work as ï¼‚one teamï¼‚. You will get global experience.
## å·¥ä½œå…§å®¹
- Design, develop for, and operate a 24/7/365 system.
- Understand business needs and define the best architecture.
- Lead a team in terms of engineering and developing processes.
- Programming and development skills are also required.
- Plan and execute projects with engineers in your team and other product/project managers.
## èƒ½åŠ›éœ€æ±‚
- Experience in software development (Design, Development, Test, Release, Operation)
- Programming experience in one of following: RoR , Java, PHP, Node.js
- Programming experience in HTML, CSS, Javascript
- Experience in Linux or Unix
- Coordinate work flexibly with multiple stakeholders
### èªè¨€èƒ½åŠ›
- English: Business Level
### åŠ åˆ†
- Experience with large-scale systems
- Experience with offshore development
- Experience with i18n system
- Experience of Engineer Leader
- Experience with Jenkins, Docker, Rundeck
- Experience with Scala

title: ã€å¾µæ‰ã€‘Bindo POS - å‰ç«¯å·¥ç¨‹å¸«
body:
## åœ˜éšŠç°¡ä»‹/åœ°é»

https://bindopos.com/zh-tw/
Based on Hong Kong/Taiwan, Bindo is the one-stop retail solution for local retailers. Our iPad/iPhone point-of-sale (POS) system makes it incredibly easy for merchants to add and manage inventory in the cloud, enabling in-store purchases to be processed with greater efficiency and speed.
å·¥ä½œåœ°é»ï¼šæ·é‹å¿ å­å¾©èˆˆç«™SOGOé™„è¿‘
## å·¥ä½œå…§å®¹

We are looking for an outstanding Front-end developer to join web app team to lead the development of high performing, modular and pixel perfect web applications. As a senior FED in our team you will work closely with product managers and web designer to build our high end web applications that are used by our customer.
## èƒ½åŠ›éœ€æ±‚
- Experience developing rich, large-scale web applications.
- Knowledge of JavaScript design patterns.
- Proficient knowledge in front-end design patterns.
- Experience with modern front-end technologies like Angular, React or ES2015.
- Familiar with modern development tools including SASS/LESS, Grunt/Gulp, Bower, Npm.
- Experience working with RESTful web services and other API's.
### åŠ åˆ†
- Experience with front-end unit testing frameworks
## è–ªè³‡ç¯„åœ

60K~100K+
12 month
## å·¥æ™‚/ç‰¹ä¼‘
- 9 AM ~ 6 PM
- 10 days Annual leave
## ç¦åˆ©/æ¨è–¦é …
- Modern software development environment
- Open mind to new technologies.
- Develop product, not client work.
## è¯çµ¡æ–¹å¼

will.you@antcosa.com

title: Meteor Developer for the Winner of 2015 Nobel Prize for students
body:
![recruit frontend dev](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/16740814/14702239/f82bc488-07db-11e6-8ff5-e4524942d3c4.png)
## About us

IMPCT is a social enterprise proudly born in Taiwan. In 2015 we won the Hult Prize, otherwise known as the Nobel Prize for students. We empower low-income entrepreneurs (across Latin America, Africa, and Asia) to own and operate sustainable education and social businesses to raise themselves out of poverty. 
## Job Description

You will use Meteor and take part in developing a first-of-its-kind web platform that will allow anyone, anywhere to invest in developing-world entrepreneurs.
## Responsibilities
- Write well designed, testable, efficient code by using best software development practices
- Create user interface using standard HTML/CSS practices
- Cooperate with web designers to match visual design intent
- Cooperate with business team to match customer needs and business vision
## Minimal Requirements
- Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field (recent graduates are welcome)
- Proficiency in Front-End Development (JavaScript / ECMAScript 2016 / TypeScript, responsive HTML5, and CSS3)
- Experience with Single Page Applications (SPA)
- Angular 2 (Ideally already experience with and/or strong motivation to learn)
- Examples of recent projects in your personal or professional portfolio
- Comfortable in an English-speaking environment
## It would be nice if you have/are:
- Self-driven with the ability to prioritize, meet deadlines, and manage changing priorities
- Knowledge of best practices of software design and ability to write unit tests for your code
- Good knowledge of Git
- Experience using Chrome Dev-Tools
- Experience with Meteor
## What we offer
- Salary between NTD 46,000 and NTD 70,000, depending on qualifications, base 13 months
- Dynamic, open-office environment. We have white boards everywhere, a ping pong table and a constant supply of coffee beans from all over the world which we grind each morning. Did we mention we have a ping pong table?
- Talented and friendly coworkers who collaborate and help each other learn and grow.
- Opportunities for rapid advancement and sharing in our success.
- Healthcare, Major Holidays and Paid Vacation.
## Workplace

å°åŒ—å¸‚å¤§å®‰å€å¿ å­æ±è·¯å››æ®µ216å··36-1è™Ÿ
## To Apply

Please send your resume at jd AT impct.co and include a link or images to portfolio or personal projects you have worked in. Fresh graduates are welcome to apply.

body:
**Web Front-end Engineer ç¶²é å‰ç«¯å·¥ç¨‹å¸«**

As a Python developer, you will be responsible for continuously extending the capabilities and features of our NAS services, supporting the many new features which are added to address customer needs and enhance the our collaboration platform.
1. At least 3 years CONTIGUOUS web front-end development experience in any kind of industry.
2. Bachelor degree or above and who can proof his work with portfolio.
3. Experience in cross-cultural project collaboration environment would be a big plus.

"With fun, we work!ï¼‚. We're looking for partners with below personalities to work together:
1. Young minded in creativities, yet steady minded in work delivery.
2. Team player, and play well.
3. Self-challenging, self-disciplined.

Proven front-end commercial programming experience of at least 3 years.
1. Familiarity with a broad range of programming paradigms.
2. Expert skills in HTML5, CSS, and Javascript is a MUST.
3. One of below proven framework experience is required: ExtJS, AngularJS.
4. Experience with using JSON as well as with JSON APIs integration.
5. Have good knowledge of site speed issues and web application performance.
6. Good understanding of Object Oriented Design (OOD) techniques desirable. Experience with UML, requirements gathering, use case analysis and object modeling.
7. Excellent communication skills. Fluent in written and spoken English is required.
8. Basic networking concept is a plus.

title: ã€å¾µæ‰ã€‘OneSky - Frontend Developer
body:
Note the engineering team is Hong Kong based, we are open for Travelling/Remote/Part-time/Full-time options.
## About OneSky

OneSky (http://www.oneskyapp.com) is a fast-growing provider of translation and localization services for apps, websites and games. We help companies expand globally through a comprehensive translation management platform and a network of professional translators.
## Responsibilities
- Collaborate with different teams to define, design and ship new features 
- Architect highly available, scalable, and secure systems 
- Technical ownership of projects and managing resources 
- Apply the best fit technology on daily work to optimize the scalability and performance of applications
## Requirements
- Love coding 
- Good communication skills 
- Relevant degree and 2+ years of hands-on experience in application development 
- Significant experience with AngularJS is a plus 
- Prior work experience at leading software companies or experience with start-ups are a huge plus
## Details/Application

https://angel.co/onesky-1/jobs/121990-app-dev-engineer-frontend-backend

title: mig.me - FrontEnd Developer for our eCommerce platform
body:
## Short Version

At mig.me we are working on an e-commerce project that will bring the shopping experience to over 35M social network users. We're growing fast and we're looking for several people to fill different positions. We mainly look for good team players, people we enjoy working with, so don't be shy and help us leading the market!

Send your english resume at damiano.t@mig.me or apply [here](http://www.104.com.tw/job/?jobno=4antc&jobsource=vip)
## More details

title: DOCCEO - Looking for Front-End Engineers to join our team
body:
### Introduction

Docceo is a dynamic start-up based in Taipei, Taiwan. We are a technology developer for the high growth hospitality and travel industry.  Docceo has been recognized by Gartner as a cool vendor to travel and hospitality, was the 1st place winner at the APEC AAN Challenge, and placed 5th out of 31 global start-ups at the 2015 APEC Global Challenge sponsored by IntelÂ® and Siemens. Microsoft is a key technology partner. 

We are an international team representing Taiwan, Germany, Holland, Sweden, Japan and USA. Our business is global and we invite individuals with global outlook to join this high potential start up.  A dynamic and innovative work environment and opportunity to be part of the organization at an early stage will be of high value in the future. 

Docceo is recruiting front-end developers responsible for the development and maintenance of the web interface of our system. Your primary focus will be the development of the MVC/AngularJS based interface for our back-end services. You will be working along-side other engineers and developers working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and creating quality products is essential. 
### Responsibilities
- Translate designs and wireframes into high quality code 
- Design, build, and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable front-end code 
- Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and ease of use of the interface 
- Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs 
- Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization 
- Define and refine specifications and requirements based upon technical needs 
- Stay plugged into emerging technologies/industry trends and apply them into operations and  
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and deliver new features 
- Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency 
- Bring innovative thinking and looking â€œoutside the boxâ€  
### Skills and Qualifications
- Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science or similar, or at least 2 years of experience in front-end web development 
- Ability to design applications with ease of use in mind 
- Experienced use of **HTML, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap and AngularJS**
- Experience in developing front-end on ASP.NET MVC back-end is a plus 
- Experience using TypeScript is a plus 
- Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements 
- Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git 
- Strong team player 
- Basic proficiency of English  
### Compensation and benefits
- NTD 45000-70000 (depending on your skills and experience)
- Health and labor insurance according to local regulations 
- Flexible working time
### Contact
- Office location: Songshan area
- email: arthur@docceo.com

title: [å¾µæ‰] Snapask - å¾µå‰ç«¯å·¥ç¨‹å¸«
body:
**Snapask is looking for young talents to join our family!**

**If you are interested to work in a promising startup. If you have passion in building an app, and to have your app used by thousands and millions of people. If you want to learn and grow together with Snapask. YOU are the one that we are looking for!**

**As our web front-end developer, you will be responsible for the development of our web page. You will work closely with our project manager, designers and back-end engineers.**
â€¢ Design, create, and modify Websites.
â€¢ Analyze user needs to implement Website content, graphics, performance, and capacity.

_Company introduction_
Founded in 2014, Snapask aims to give every student the tool to learn in the most customized manner, efficient and hassle-free, and yet in a minimal cost. Snapask, which released in January 2015, is a mobile app that allows students to ask questions about anything in one click. And we can connect them to the most eligible tutors by crowd-sourcing to provide a real-time one-to-one online class.

Our worldwide partners and supporters, such as Cyberport, HKU, SPH Plug&Play, Chinaccelerator, Taiwan Startup Stadium etc., helped us launch and promote our killer-app in different markets. Now, we operate in Hong Kong, Taipei, Shanghai and Singapore. In 2015, we raised US$1.8 million for pre-A round financing.

If you have the same goal as us, and believe you are the â€œtalentâ€ we need. We are sincerely inviting you to join this world-class, global and dynamic team to realize our vision on education!

You can check our website as well as our product here, http://appedu.co/

_Key areas of accountability_
**â€¢ Design, create, and modify Websites.**
- Design, build, or maintain Websites, using authoring or scripting languages and management tools.
- Perform or direct Website updates.
- Write supporting code for Web applications or Websites.
- Evaluate code to ensure that it is valid, is properly structured, meets industry standards, and is compatible with browsers, devices, or operating systems.
- Perform Website tests according to planned schedules, or after any Website or product revision.
- Back up files from Websites for instant recovery in case of problems.

**â€¢ Cooperate with designers, analyze and identify problems with PM and other engineers.**
- Identify problems uncovered by testing and correct problems or refer problems to PM for correction.
- Confer with management or development teams to prioritize needs, resolve conflicts, develop content criteria, or choose solutions.
- Collaborate with PM and designers to deliver our website.

_Qualification and experience_
â€¢ Have a Computer Science degree or you have relevant work experience.
â€¢ 0-3 years experiences in front-end web page development.
â€¢ Experience creating & working on HTML5 Responsive and Reactive Web Pages.
â€¢ Experience using frameworks and tools such as AngularJS, React, jQuery, Bootstrap, Meteor, or other Front End Frameworks.
â€¢ Experience using and building REST APIs.

_Skills and abilities_
â€¢ Proficiency in Mandarin Chinese or Cantonese, and written English.
â€¢ Think critically and crave problems to solve.
â€¢ Plan ahead and be able to manage your time efficiently.
â€¢ Be a good communicator who can talk through challenges to find the best solution in an efficient manner.

_Others_
â€¢ Experience in working in cross-functional teams. We love candidates who are willing to take on responsibilities that extend beyond the web front-end development.

_Compensation and benefits_
NTD 50000-65000 (depending on your ability), 14 months guaranteed.
Team performance based bonus
Flexible working time

_Work place_
å°åŒ—å¸‚å¤§å®‰å€å¾©èˆˆå—è·¯äºŒæ®µ27è™Ÿ4æ¨“ä¹‹6

**We strongly believe that this partnership is the start of an enriching and worthwhile journey. Interested parties please send your resume/CV to kenneth.kuo@appedu.co**

**Job description**

**Join a world-class product development team as a practitioner of innovation and growth. This position is responsible for product development through effective global teamwork. You will work closely with project manager, designers and other engineers.**
â€¢ Develop, create, and modify mobile applications for the android platform.
â€¢ Work with PM, designers and other engineers to analyze and solve problems.

_Key areas of accountability_
**â€¢ Develop, create, and modify mobile applications for the android platform.**
- Translate designs and wireframes into high quality code.
- Design, build, and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable Java code
- Develop and direct application system testing and validation procedures, programming, and documentation.
- Conduct testing, modify mobile applications to fix bugs and allow it to adapt to different hardware, or to improve its performance.
- Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.

**â€¢ Work with PM, designers and other engineers to analyze and solve problems.**
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
- Follow instructions, assignments and project deadlines required by project manager.
- Confer with designers and other engineers to identify and resolve problems.

_Qualification and experience_
â€¢ Have a Computer Science degree or you have relevant work experience.
â€¢ 0-3 years experiences in front-end mobile application development.
â€¢ Proficiency in Java using Eclipse or other IDE and related tools for Android development and its testing.
â€¢ Good understanding and practical experience using object-oriented design principles and patterns.
â€¢ Basic understanding of the Android framework and its life cycles.
â€¢ Basic understanding of core Android concepts such as layouts, views, fragments and activities.
â€¢ Knowledge of the open-source Android ecosystem and the libraries available for common tasks

_Skills and abilities_
â€¢ Proficiency in Mandarin Chinese or Cantonese, and written English.
â€¢ Think critically and crave problems to solve.
â€¢ Plan ahead and be able to manage your time efficiently.
â€¢ Be a good communicator who can talk through challenges to find the best solution in an efficient manner.

_Others_
â€¢ Interest in start-ups and love in using new mobile applications are plus.
â€¢ Feel free to share your Github in your resume if you have.

**Salary TWD 40-50k(Can be negotiated)**

**Location å°åŒ—å¸‚å¤§å®‰å€å¾©èˆˆå—è·¯äºŒæ®µ27è™Ÿ4æ¨“ä¹‹6**

**We strongly believe that this partnership is the start of an enriching and worthwhile journey. Interested parties please send your resume/CV to kenneth.kuo@appedu.co**

title: iOS Developer @ Global Travel Assistant Limited
body:
A fast moving startup looking for Sr. iOS Developer to join our ranks.
Responsibilities
â€¢ Communicate with our technical teams in overseas offices to discuss progress and issues
â€¢ Take over projects started by other developers depending on priorities set by the PM
â€¢ Participate in project planning assist the PM in setting out milestones
â€¢ Timely maintenance of relevant documentations
â€¢ Meet the project schedule as discussed by the teams
â€¢ Provide daily project updates for the PM
Requirements
â€¢ Minimum 2 years in iOS development
â€¢ Extensive experience working with both SOAP and REST APIs
â€¢ Extensive experience using SQLite and Core Data
â€¢ Experience in developing toolkits or SDKs
â€¢ Able to Work alone on deliverables with minimal supervision
â€¢ Be able to work with or without using Storyboards or IBs
Nice to have
â€¢ Experience working with P2P VOIP protocols (SIP a big plus)
â€¢ .Net experience
â€¢ Experience working with complex/custom UIs
â€¢ Experience with Swift

## è»Ÿé«”å·¥ç¨‹å¸« - Front End
### Responsibilities
- Implement the features and user interfaces of monitoring system.
- Architect efficient and reusable front-end systems that drive complex web applications.
- Collaborate with Product Designers, Product Managers, and Software Engineers to deliver compelling user-facing products.
- Identify and resolve performance and scalability issues.
- Data visualization.
### Requirements
- Experience with HTML/CSS, including concepts like layout, specificity, cross browser compatibility.
- Proficient in Javascript, including concepts like asynchronous programming, closures, types. Experience with ES6 would be a great plus.
- Experienced with at least one JS framework (React, Angular, etc.) combined with the capability to write beautiful code independently of these.
- Can easily pick up new front end libraries and frameworks.
- Familiarity with interactive data visualization using tools such as D3.js, Flot, Highcharts, or Echarts.
- Familiarity with Git.
### Extra
- Experience with scripting languages (Node.js, Python, etc.)
- Familiar with pre-processors languages (SASS & Compass, or LESS...)
- Familiar with Task Runner (Grunt or Gulp)
- Experience with module loader (Webpack, Browserify, or RequireJS)
- Experience with web toolkit (Bootstrap, Foundation, or semantic-UI)
- Experience with client-side graphics, animation and data visualization (SVG, HTML Canvas, CSS transitions/animations)
- Experience with SPA (Single Page Application).
- Understanding of UI/UX principles.
- Has participated in open source projects.

å°‹æ‰¾ä¸€ä½è³‡æ·±é ˜å°å·¥ç¨‹å¸«ï¼Œä»¥åŠæœ‰ç¶“é©—çš„å‰ç«¯å·¥ç¨‹å¸«ä¾†åŠ å…¥ç·šä¸Šé›»å½±æ–°ç”¢å“çš„front end team. å¦‚æœä½ å°é›»å½±æœ‰å¼·çƒˆçš„ç†±å¿±ï¼Œä¸å–œæ­¡ä¸€é™³ä¸è®Šçš„å·¥ä½œå‹æ…‹ï¼Œè«‹ä¸è¦çŒ¶è±«å¿«ä¾†è©¦è©¦ã€‚
